  <title>Watersheds</title>
  <abstract>&lt;DIV STYLE="text-align:Left;">&lt;DIV>&lt;DIV>&lt;P>&lt;SPAN>Demarcates the extent of Level 2 watersheds within the province of New Brunswick. The extent of these has been determined based upon the waterbody and watercourse layers that have been constructed as part of the NBHN.  Level 1 watersheds represent the broadest definition of the extent of the watersheds that is possible.  These watersheds are further subdivided into the Level 2 watersheds that are represented here.&lt;/SPAN>&lt;/P>&lt;/DIV>&lt;/DIV>&lt;/DIV></abstract>
